summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 1.8°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 4.9 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 335 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1914 m), feels like temperature (up 1.7°C), outside temperature (up 2.1°C), and inside temperature (up 2.4°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, you’ll experience intense stickiness in the air and very little to no wind will be present. Periods of rain anticipated, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and the light is absent. Changeable conditions.
